subject: Carbon fiber heel plate
description_text:
Hello, I'm interested in buying the simsonn carbon fiber heel plate, but I
don't know if it fits my rig, can it be mounted without the baseplate? If
so, can you send me some dimensions of the heel plate, and the distances
between the holes?

conversations.body_text: Hello, what equipment are you using.

Hello, I have a Playseat Formula Instinct, and my Simsonn Pro X pedals are
attached directly to the Playseat pedal plate, without a baseplate.


On Fri, 4 Jul 2025 at 16:07, service@simsonn.com
Hello, what equipment are you using.     My details are on the office computer and I will send you the details next Monday.

Ok, thanks.

On Fri, 4 Jul 2025 at 18:46, service@simsonn.com
